snippet.title: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Mask of Darkness |DLC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Prince of Persia The Lost Crown's DLC "Mask of Darkness" is available now on Ubisoft+, Ubisoft Store, Ubisoft Connect, Steam, Nintendo Switch, PS5/4, Xbox Series X|S, One, Epic Games Store and Amazon Luna.

Experience Sargon's darkest quest yet: step away from Mount Qaf to dive into a brand-new story of loss and danger.

Players can also discover the critically acclaimed Metroidvania with the Complete Edition available now, including the base game, the Mask of Darkness Story DLC, 3 outfits for Sargon, the Prosperity Bird Amulet, and a digital adventure guide.
 ----
Want to know more about the game? :
https://www.ubisoft.com/game/prince-of-persia/the-lost-crown

Join the community to see more gameplay ⚔️
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/princeofpersia_game/?hl=fr
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/princeofpersia
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/princeofpersia
DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/PrinceofPersia
---

About Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown:
Dash into a stylish and thrilling action-adventure platformer set in a mythological Persian world where the boundaries of time and space are yours to manipulate.
Play as Sargon and evolve from sword-wielding prodigy to extraordinary legend as you master acrobatic combat and unlock new Time Powers and unique super abilities.

#Ubisoft #PrinceofPersia

About Ubisoft:
Ubisoft is a creator of worlds, committed to enriching players’ lives with original and memorable entertainment experiences. Ubisoft’s global teams create and develop a deep and diverse portfolio of games, featuring brands such as Assassin’s Creed®, Brawlhalla®, For Honor®, Far Cry®, Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon®, Just Dance®, Rabbids®, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six®, The Crew® and Tom Clancy’s The Division®. Through Ubisoft Connect, players can enjoy an ecosystem of services to enhance their gaming experience, get rewards and connect with friends across platforms. With Ubisoft+, the subscription service, they can access a growing catalog of more than 100 Ubisoft games and DLC. For the 2023-24 fiscal year, Ubisoft generated net bookings of €2.32 billion. To learn more, please visit: www.ubisoftgroup.com.

© 2024 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Ubisoft and the Ubisoft logo are registered trademarks in the US and/or other countries.
